amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to increase and decrease funding by $21 million for the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States to encourage the Committee to evaluate the rising threat of farmland owned by adversarial nations.
amendment.purpose: Amendment increases and decreases funding by $21 million for the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States to encourage the Committee to evaluate the rising threat of farmland owned by adversarial nations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 336 - 86 (Roll no. 623).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 336 - 86 (Roll no. 623).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
